original_text: And thou shalt offer them before the Lord, and the priests shall cast salt upon them, and they shall offer them up for a burnt offering unto the Lord.
korean_text: 나 여호와 앞에 받들어다가 제사장은 그 위에 소금을 쳐서 나 여호와께 번제로 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt offer them before the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것들을 주 앞에 드릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the priests shall cast salt upon them
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장들은 그것들 위에 소금을 뿌릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and they shall offer them up
for a burnt offering unto the Lord
